LanguageData.CookBRGohan1.label: Cook Brown Rice Gohan
LanguageData.CookBRGohan1.description: Take raw rice-kome-and cook it to make Gohan.
LanguageData.CookBRGohan4.label: Cook Brown Rice Gohan (4)
LanguageData.CookBRGohan4.description: Take raw rice-kome-and cook it to make Gohan.
LanguageData.CookGohan1.label: Cook White Rice Gohan
LanguageData.CookGohan1.description: Make Gohan, a staple food and term for "meal." When paired with Asa, Hiru, and Ban it can mean breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
LanguageData.CookGohan4.label: Cook White Rice Gohan (4)
LanguageData.CookGohan4.description: Make Gohan, a staple food and term for "meal." When paired with Asa, Hiru, and Ban it can mean breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
LanguageData.CookTsukudani.label: Boil Tsukudani with insect meat (4)
LanguageData.CookTsukudani.description: Sweeten insect meat by boiling it with sugar and soy sauce.
LanguageData.CookKorokke4.label: Cook Korokke (4)
LanguageData.CookKorokke4.description: Create Korokke, an offshoot of croquettes.
